result.execSummary:
The defendant Krista J Klaas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Krista J Klaas is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Krista J Klaas was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Krista J Klaas

defendant.name: Klaas, Krista J
defendant.address: N5852 Oak Tree Acres, Princeton, WI 54968

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Payment Plan Agreement / Letter of Understanding

9:32 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by ADA - upon plea to count 1 with a fine and costs, will dismiss count 2.  Defendant concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1.  Court orders count 2 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

$100 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 9:38 a.m.

8:50 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Statement by DA - requests to meet with the DA.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court will set for Status Hearing on September 8, 2015 at 10:00 a.m.  Defendant to stop and make appt with the DA's office

Court adjourned at 8:54 a.m.
